overview: A Â£20,000 insurance claim is lodged when a nightclub is destroyed by fire, and claims investigator Mike Davies is assigned to get to the bottom of things. One suspect is Harry Drayson, the club owner but if he torched his own property for the insurance, how safe are his other, heavily insured properties?
tagline: He Had a Nose for Trouble - But This Time He Was Playing With Fire...
title: Man with a Gun
